 * Notes:		Note that all GUI creation code is declared in
 * 				gui.h source file which is generated by wxFormBuilder.
 *********************************************************************/

#ifndef __main__
#define __main__

// main wxWidgets header file
#include <wx/wx.h>
// gui classes generated by wxFormBuilder
#include "gui.h"

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// application class declaration 
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

class MainApp : public wxApp
{
	public:
		virtual bool OnInit();
};

// declare global static function wxGetApp()
DECLARE_APP(MainApp)

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// main application frame declaration 
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
enum class tombol{tambah,kurang,kali,bagi};
class MainFrame : public MainFrameBase
{
	public:
		MainFrame( wxWindow *parent );
		virtual ~MainFrame();
		
	protected:
		// protected event handlers
		virtual void OnCloseFrame( wxCloseEvent& event );
		virtual void OnExitClick( wxCommandEvent& event );
        
        virtual void Tombol1( wxCommandEvent& event ) ;
		virtual void Tombol2( wxCommandEvent& event ) ;
		virtual void Tombol3( wxCommandEvent& event ) ;
		virtual void Tombol_tmb( wxCommandEvent& event ) ;
		virtual void Tombol4( wxCommandEvent& event ) ;
		virtual void Tombol5( wxCommandEvent& event ) ;
		virtual void Tombol6( wxCommandEvent& event ) ;
		virtual void Tombol_kurang( wxCommandEvent& event ) ;
		virtual void Tombol7( wxCommandEvent& event ) ;
		virtual void Tombol8( wxCommandEvent& event ) ;
		virtual void Tombol9( wxCommandEvent& event ) ;
		virtual void Tombol_kali( wxCommandEvent& event ) ;
		virtual void Tombolc( wxCommandEvent& event ) ;
		virtual void Tombol0( wxCommandEvent& event ) ;
		virtual void Tombol_samadengan( wxCommandEvent& event ) ;
		virtual void Tombol_bagi( wxCommandEvent& event ) ;
        virtual void Even_menu_about( wxCommandEvent& event );

private:
    int bil1;
    int bil2;
    int hasil;
    std::string tampung;
    tombol Tombol;
};


#endif //__main__
